lesson_info.title: Model Evaluation and Validation
lesson_info.description: Assessing model performance and avoiding overfitting

learning_objectives: Understand the fundamental concepts and principles of Model Evaluation and Validation
Apply Model Evaluation and Validation techniques in practical, real-world scenarios
Analyze the relationship between Model Evaluation and Validation and other topics in Machine Learning Applications
Evaluate the effectiveness of different approaches to Model Evaluation and Validation
Create solutions using Model Evaluation and Validation methodologies and best practices
